text: An American Dream (also known as See You in Hell, Darling) is a 1966 American drama movie directed by Robert Gist and was based on the 1965 novel of the same name by Norman Mailer. It stars Stuart Whitman, Janet Leigh, Eleanor Parker, Lloyd Nolan, Murray Hamilton, Les Crane and Warren Stevens. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1967. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1966 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies about uxoricide
title: An American Dream (movie)
